<div align="center"><center>

## Claim Points

[![Environment](https://img.shields.io/badge/Environment-Client-purple)]()
[![Latest Minecraft](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/game-versions/dyuTci89?label=Latest%20Minecraft&color=%2300AF5C)](https://modrinth.com/mod/dyuTci89/versions)

[![Loader](https://img.shields.io/badge/Loader-Fabric-dbd0b4?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://fabricmc.net/)
[![Loader](https://img.shields.io/badge/Loader-NeoForge-f16436?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://neoforged.net/)

[![Modrinth Downloads](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/dyuTci89?label=Modrinth%20Downloads&logo=modrinth&logoColor=%2300AF5C)](https://modrinth.com/mod/dyuTci89)

A small client-side mod that integrates with Xaero's Minimap to allow the user to add 
GriefPrevention claim coordinates (listed in chat using `/claimlist`) as Xaero Waypoints.

Intended to make it easier to locate claims that you might want to remove to free up claim-blocks.

</center></div>
